mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, (c.ctbny_pc / b.cntr_obctr * 100) AS percent, c.ctbny_pc FROM tb_mlrd as a LEFT JOIN tb_cntr AS b ON a.cntr_sn = b.cntr_sn LEFT JOIN tb_cntr_ctbny AS c ON a.cntr_sn = c.cntr_sn WHERE mlrd_sn = #{mlrd_sn}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_mlrd_comt (mbr_sn, mlrd_sn, comt_cn, rgtr_id, rgtr_dt) values (#{mbr_sn}, #{mlrd_sn}, #{comt_cn}, #{rgtr_id}, #{rgtr_dt})
mapper.select: select a.comt_sn, a.mbr_sn, a.mlrd_sn, a.comt_cn, a.rgtr_dt, b.mbr_nm, b.mbr_id, b.mbr_ncnm from tb_mlrd_comt a inner join tb_mbr b on a.mbr_sn = b.mbr_sn where a.mlrd_sn = #{mlrd_sn}
